info.base: base directory for the project, e.g. the folder where main.py is.
info.filenames: generate a file with the absolute routes for each pdf to compute (for example with the command $find [/absolute/route/to/data/] -name *pdf > filenames.txt).
info.precalculate: Set true for installation, it will take for 2h to compute 300PDFs, but after finishing just set it to `false` and you won't do it again.
